availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sylvester Isaacs (Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer, captain (U.S.A.). )

body.p: Owsley County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Elijah Isaacs and Sarah Bowman. Married to Martha Brewer Isaacs in Owsley County, Kentucky on June 2, 1853. Father of Sarah Isaacs Hall, James B. Isaacs, Mary Isaacs Mainous, Preston Isaacs, Orvil Isaacs. Farm laborer in Owsley County in 1850. Farmer in Owsley County in 1860. Served in 14th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry (U.S.A.) as first lieutenant and captain from May 1, 1863 to March 24, 1864.
